title: Saber Mirghorbani
text:
Seyed Saber Mirghorbani (, born September 17, 1983 in <a href="Babolsar">Babolsar</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>) is an Iranian <a href="soccer">football</a> player.
International career.
Saber Mirghorbani was called up to the <a href="Iran%20national%20football%20team">Iran national football team</a> in June 2007 for the <a href="West%20Asian%20Football%20Federation%20Championship%202007">West Asian Football Federation Championship 2007</a>. He made his debut for <a href="Iran%20national%20football%20team">Iran</a> in a match vs <a href="Palestine%20national%20football%20team">Palestine</a>.
